reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable with pockets, and flattering, particularly noting it works well for growing baby bumps. The fit and color receive mixed feedback - while some appreciate the perfect maxi length, others find it too tight, and while some love the color, others say it's way off. Moreover, the quality and value for money are mixed, with some finding it great quality for the price while others consider it overpriced. Additionally, the seam quality is concerning, with multiple customers reporting that the dress falls apart at seams and rips after first wash. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Relaxed | Feminine | Effortlessly Pretty
items.body: When comfort meets charm! This dress is so cute, soft and feminine. It has a flattering fit. No need to iron. The material is breathable but not see through. The bottom is flowy. I am postpartum and feel very comfortable in this dress. It also has pockets! Itâ€™s the perfect no fuss, throw on and go dress. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute!
items.body: Iâ€™ve gotten so many compliments on this dress Iâ€™m tempted to get another color. Fits well and good quality! It tempts the off the shoulder but doesnâ€™t need to be. But it is on the edge of my shoulder so if that would bug you thatâ€™s my only warning on it. Otherwise the shoulders stay on and itâ€™s cuts! Read more
items.author: Mariah Andrews

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfortable, free people dupe!
items.body: Free people dupe! I am 165 lbs, 5â€™5â€™â€™. Medium fit snug but well in cinched area. There is a nice stretch to material but not loose. Sleeves and skirt of dress have a nice oversized flowy feel but sleeves fit securely to forearm. I have mine pulled up in this picture for a puff sleeve look. The dress has pockets which I do not care for since it makes the sides of skirt stick out a tad, but not too noticeable if you flatten them. Overall very cute and free people dupe! Needs to be steamed before wear due to wrinkles when opened. Read more
items.author: Allison Argueta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress
items.body: Beautiful, just as pictured. I love how versatile the sleeves can be depending on how you want to wear the dress. I ordered a size medium and it fit perfectly. I am 5â€™ 4â€ and currently weigh 145lbs for photo reference. Read more
items.author: Anthony/Elizabeth

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute IF you donâ€™t look closely
items.body: For the quality, this should really be a $25 dress. I knew it was a risk after reading the other reviews. Other sellers had the same risky reviews. Trust me, I did the digging. I hand washed it and hung it up to dry. There is a hole in the sleeve, there are a lot of loose strings, and there are a few flowers that donâ€™t have the center sewn in or itâ€™s partially sewn. If you can overlook the small flaws, itâ€™s a cute dress. It fits nicely and it would be flattering on many body types. There is a ton of stretch in the bodice. Itâ€™s actually really supportive in the bust. I have a large bust and thereâ€™s still tons of stretch. The material is soft and thick enough where you donâ€™t need a slip. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 and it comes to my lower shin. I bought a large. If you decide to buy it, expect to have to treat it really gently. Read more
items.author: Kelly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant yet Boho!
items.body: I'm 5'7" and 150 pounds and I ordered a medium. I have a size DD chest and am able to wear this without a bra (because I like to slide the sleeves half shoulder) I get so many compliments on this dress! Could be for maternity (initially bought it for that) or non maternity (ended up wearing it for non maternity family photos). It's a perfect dress for a fall photoshoot or spring event like Easter! Read more
items.author: Jolie

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars I REALLY wanted to like it ðŸ’”
items.body: I REALLY wanted to like this dress. The colors are so fun and it looked like it'd be so comfortable!! I had planned on buying one and then several colors. I initially went with Navy in medium. I am about 5'9" 140 lbs. It is very tight around the bust and at the cuffs. 15 minutes of trying it on it felt like I had tourniquets on my arms. It is also very hot. The quality is top tier and it a beautiful but ultimately I ended up returning ðŸ’” Read more
items.author: Chelsea

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress overall but some things to consider!!
items.body: I ordered this dress 3 times. First in the â€œPurpleâ€ and â€œCreamâ€ colors - pictures included. The coloring was just wayyyy off from what was shown in the product description pictures. The flowers on the purple dress are bright red. The flowers on the cream dress were a bright green - not at all what I was wanting unfortunately. I returned those two & took a chance and ordered the â€œBeigeâ€ color, thankfully that one actually came in looking like the color pictured! I loved the neutral look of it and wore for my baby shower at 30 weeks pregnant. Size medium fit great. Iâ€™m 5â€™5 & normally 150lb, currently at 180 & it was comfortable and looked great - canâ€™t wait to wear it after pregnancy as well! Another downside was how wrinkled this fabric is. You will definitely want to steam before wearing. Made a huge difference for my dress. Of the 3 I ordered - they were all a bit see through but the â€œcreamâ€ color was by far the most see through! I just wore pregnancy spanx under my dress but would have liked to have a slip ideally. I think itâ€™s a little pricey for what it is (kinda cheaply made, may not hold up super well) but nothing ships faster than an amazon dress and Iâ€™m always looking for these things at the last minute, so it was worth it for me! Read more
items.author: Brookses

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Cream, Rose, Black, Ginger, Navy Blue, Orange, Dark Brown, Dark Red, Dark Green, Light Blue, Pink, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
